lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qO mrwl mwl bYTq hY mwnsr mukqw Amol Kwie Kwie ibgswq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Maraal Maal Baitthat Hai Maanasara , Moukataa Amol Khaai Khaai Bigasaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a flock of swans reaches lake Mansarover and feels pleased eating pearls there

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qO sujn imil bYTq hY pwkswl Aink pRkwr ibMjnwid rs Kwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Sujan Mili Baitthat Hai Paakasaala , Anik Prakaar Binjanaadi Ras Khaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as friends get together in a kitchen and enjoy several dainty dishes together,

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy dRum CwXw iml bYTq Anyk pMCI Kwie Pl mDur bcn kY suhwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Droum Chhaayaa Mil Baitthat Anayk Panchhee , Khaai Dhal Madhur Bachan Kai Suhaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as several birds collect in the shade of a tree and eating its sweet fruits produce melodious sounds,

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gurisK iml bYTq Drmswl shj sbd rs AMmiRq AGwq hY ]559]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gursikh Mil Baitthat Dharamasaala , Sahaj Sabad Ras Anmrit Aghaat Hai ?559?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, faithful and obedient disciple get together in a Dharamsala and by contemplating on His elixir-like name feel happy and satisfied.  (559)
